DirectFB Reference Manual
DirectFB Interfaces   IDirectFBPalette

No summary yet...

Methods of IDirectFBPalette
Retrieving information GetCapabilities Return the capabilities of this palette.
GetSize Get the number of entries in the palette.
Palette entries SetEntries Write entries to the palette.
GetEntries Read entries from the palette.
FindBestMatch Find the best matching entry.
Clone CreateCopy Create a copy of the palette.
